| History                 = Clan Orii was a [[Tokyo]]-based [[Yakuza (Earth-616)|Yakuza syndicate]] with branches in the United States. It had a presence on both the West Coast and the East Coast. On the east coast it's stronghold was in [[Philadelphia (Pennsylvania)|Philadelphia]] where they control a crime cartel, and they were expanding into [[New York City]].{{r|Daredevil Vol 2 57|58}}{{r|White Tiger Vol 1 3}} 

It was led by [[Kenzo Orii (Earth-616)|Kenzo Orii]], but in the United States leading the expansion was [[Sano Orii (Earth-616)|Sano Orii]] his brash and reckless son. Who brought attention to the clan's operations by selling [[Mutant Growth Hormone]], assaulting American constumes, and killing police. Sano wanted to make a statement by killing an American super-powered hero.{{r|Daredevil Vol 2 57|59}}{{r|White Tiger Vol 1 4}}

The MGH dealing operation was taken down by [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] with the assistance of [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]], [[Daniel Rand (Earth-616)|Iron Fist]], and [[Luke Cage (Earth-616)|Luke Cage]].{{r|Daredevil Vol 2 59|60}} Later they partnered with the [[Chaeyi (Earth-616)|Chaeyi]] syndicate and were involved in smuggling U.S. passports and green cards.{{r|White Tiger Vol 1 1|6}} 

The operation was disrupted by [[Angela del Toro (Earth-616)|White Tiger]] backed up by [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]], [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]], [[Luke Cage (Earth-616)|Luke Cage]], and [[Daniel Rand (Earth-616)|Iron Fist]]. During the battle with the Yakuza and the street gang working for them, Sano accidentally killed his father. He then committed seppuku (ritual suicide), after which the police arrived and arrested the gang members and Yakuza.{{r|White Tiger Vol 1 6}}
